xxl.core.predicates

Class ProjectionPredicate<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.predicates.FeaturePredicate<P[],P[]>
      • xxl.core.predicates.ProjectionPredicate<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type of the predicate's parameters.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate<P[]>

    public class ProjectionPredicate<P>
extends FeaturePredicate<P[],P[]>
    This class provides a decorator predicate that applies a projection to the arguments of the underlying predicate. Everytime arguments are passed to the invoke method of this class, the arguments are first projected using a given projection and afterwards passed to the invoke method of the underlying predicate.
    See Also:
    Projection

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class xxl.core.predicates.FeaturePredicate

        mapping, predicate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectionPredicate(Predicate<P[]> predicate, Projection<P> projection)
      Creates a new projection predicate that applies the specified projection to the arguments of it's invoke methods before the invoke method of the given predicate is called.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class xxl.core.predicates.FeaturePredicate

        invoke, invoke, invoke, invoke

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectionPredicate

        public ProjectionPredicate(Predicate<P[]> predicate,
                           Projection<P> projection)
        Creates a new projection predicate that applies the specified projection to the arguments of it's invoke methods before the invoke method of the given predicate is called.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate which input arguments should be mapped.
        projection - the projection that is applied to the arguments of the wrapped predicate.
